items.q: How to request this coach for corporate training?
items.a: Use the WhatsApp button to share your requirements. We will coordinate schedules and program details.

items.q: Does the coach handle university and graduates segments?
items.a: Yes. Focus on Universities and Graduates; sessions are typically online.

items.q: What topics can this coach teach?
items.a: Competitive Programming, OOP, Databases, .NET/ASP.NET Core, REST APIs, Testing basics and more.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
